thread.title: Daryn Trowbridge. Australia.
thread.title_full: www.arguscarhire.com reviewed by Daryn Trowbridge. Australia.

author: Daryn Trowbridge. Australia.
title: Daryn Trowbridge. Australia.
text: Booked online 6 months prior. Paid up front as we wanted to do. Great selection of cars on line and when we arrived. Was winter so maybe quieter but got exactly as we wanted probably a little more than expected. Car was newish 20,000km. No problems no issues ran smoothly. Drive through snow ice and extremes. Handled great. Service at pick up and drop off was quick easy and hassle free. Would rent again any day. Very happy.
